forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
